channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1356; 06:08PM; 9701 W Yoakum Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/46FZrkM; #BeverlyCrest; 32 LAFD Firefighters took just 34 minutes to fully extinguish stubborn fire that was largely confined to the garage area on the first (lowest - street level) floor of a 2,943 square foot three-story ascending hillside home (built 1945). All occupants out on LAFD arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 99; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 E108 E278 E288 E71 E99 RA71 RA878 RA99 T78 T88; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1356; 05:34PM; 9701 W Yoakum Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/46FZrkM; #BeverlyCrest; PRELIM: Offensive fire attack at a three story ascending hillside home with fire on the "bottom floor". ; FS 99; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 E108 E278 E288 E71 E99 RA878 RA99 T78 T88; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1073; 02:59PM; 10480 W National Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/45qqFdY; #Palms; 48 Firefighters took just 18 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire within one top floor apartment containing excessive personal storage, in the northwest section of a 53,762 square foot, 80 unit, three-story garden style apartment building (built 1968). No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC9 CM20 CM22 E237 E263 E292 E43 E58 E62 E63 EM9 RA37 RA58 RA892 SO1 T37 T63 T92; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1073; 02:41PM; 10480 W National Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/45qqFdY; #Palms; PRELIM: Offensive battle against fire showing from one unit on the top (third) floor of a three-story apartment building.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 BC9 CM20 CM22 E237 E263 E292 E43 E58 E62 E63 EM9 RA37 RA58 RA892 SO1 T37 T63 T92; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0738; 11:37AM; 908 N Macneil St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46GcRgI; City of #SanFernando; 23 LAFD Firefighters took just 13 minutes to access, confine and extinguish flames within a detached two car garage conversion, that was fully involved with fire on LAFD arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District City of #SanFernando; BC12 E287 E298 E75 E91 E98 RA891 RA91 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0738; 11:24AM; 908 N Macneil St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46GcRgI; City of #SanFernando; PRELIM: Offensive firefighting operations at a detached two car garage conversion fully involved with fire, to the rear of a one-story home. No other structures threatened.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District City of San Fernando; BC12 E287 E298 E75 E91 E98 RA891 RA91 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update STATIC Explosion; INC#1726; 11:57PM; 2039 S Santa Fe Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZKPXSR; #DowntownLA; No hazardous materials were located at the scene, as LAFD HazMat specialists systematically searched the area. All readings came back normal. Their operation was concluded just before midnight and the scene was handed over to L.A. IMPACT (visit oag.ca.gov/bi/laimpact for more information on this Task Force) and LAFD units will clear the scene. Nothing further.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 AR12 BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E14 E17 E21 E221 E9 EM1 ER1 JT6 RA14 RA17 SO1 SQ21 T21 T9; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0278; 04:38AM; 960 W 62nd Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/46n2Dlu; Vermont-Slauson; Firefighters arrived at a 3-story apartment building to find fire in one unit on the second floor, being held in check by a fire sprinkler. Crews quickly made access to the unit and provided final extinguishment in 13 minutes from the time of alarm (4:51am). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. Nothing further.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E57 E66 RA257 RA33 RA833 SO1 SQ21 T33 T66; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Update Physical Rescue; INC#1982; 11:40PM; 3354 N Barham Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tn4uIo; #HollywoodHills; Firefighters used hydraulic rescue tools to free one adult male from the wreckage. Firefighter-Paramedics are now transporting him to an area hospital in critical condition. Nothing further.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E27 E76 E86 EM14 HR3 RA27 RA86 T27 UR88; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1982; 11:07PM; 3354 N Barham Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tn4uIo; #HollywoodHills; Two-vehicle collision with one patient trapped. Firefighters are performing auto extrication measures. LAPD Inc #5017.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E27 E76 E86 EM14 HR3 RA27 RA86 T27 UR88; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange
